txt_en: New year, new life.
Forget your troubles and just get happy.
Being brave doesn't mean you go looking for trouble.
txt_cn: 勇敢不代表着自找麻烦。

txt_en: Love is all that matters.
You are the best.
I have to get out of my comfort zone.
Don't let anyone stop you from getting what you want.
txt_cn: 别让任何人阻挡你得到想要的东西。

txt_en: Stand up for yourself.
Study hard, rise to the top, and do important things.
txt_cn: 努力学习，勇于争先，做重要的事。

txt_en: You are my world.
I learn from the past.
You better chase all your cares away.
txt_cn: 将所有的烦恼一扫而空吧。

txt_en: I need to broaden my horizons.
It's time for a family reunion.
Today is a good day.
We protect each other.
The world is a beautiful place.
Life is like a roller coaster. You can scream every time you hit a bump, or you can throw your hands up and enjoy the ride.
txt_cn: 生活就像过山车，你可以在颠簸时尖叫，也可以享受整个过程。

txt_en: Life is precious.
Our future is bright.
Out with the old, in with the new.
Good luck in the New Year.
Friends are forever.
Embrace your true self.
Family is very important.
The key to any successful relationship is communication.
txt_cn: 沟通是所有关系成功的关键。

txt_en: Love is what makes life worth living.
You should believe in yourself.
I am the happiest man alive.
